gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Jazz 127, Mavericks 90
gameRecap.excerpt: Jordan Clarkson notched his first career triple-double as the Jazz defeat the Mavericks, 127-90. Clarkson recorded 20 points, 10 rebounds, and a season-high 11 assists for the Jazz, while Simone Fontecchio added a team-high 24 points in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 19 points, six rebounds, and 14 assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Jazz improve to 15-19 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 19-15.
